attributes.action: Rishi Sunak to be removed from office if Bully dog are removed from family homes
attributes.additional_details: Because the prime minister should be asking the general public about banning certain things not to just do what ever they want
attributes.background: To remove prime minister from office because of betrayal to the BRITISH people and a vote of the the public needs to be made for a new prime minister. And any laws that affect BRITISH citizens

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
